reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Tough but fair grading.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor. Makes complex topics accessible and fun.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes disorganized. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Assignments can be challenging.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Excellent teacher. Lab sessions are well-structured and informative.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Moves too fast through material. Needs to provide more examples.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful discussions. Heavy reading load but worth it.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dry lectures but very knowledgeable. Exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking classes. Encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex concepts. Homework can be challenging.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips are a great addition.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting topics but can be biased. Encourages debate.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer. Projects are relevant and interesting.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Often goes off-topic. Grading criteria are unclear.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant researcher and teacher. Challenging but rewarding course.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Practical approach. Guest speakers add valuable insights.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Interesting material but fast-paced. More practice exercises needed.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher. Makes complex concepts accessible and fun.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Field work component is valuable.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes unclear. Extra help sessions are useful.
